prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small fish with vibrant blue scales and dark accents.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a school of fish, with a shimmering blue body and a playful nature.
Generate a unique aquatic Pokemon with a streamlined shape, primarily blue, and a hint of dark shading.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea with a bright blue color and distinctive fin features.
Imagine a small fish-like Pokemon with a charming blue body and a calm disposition swimming through the ocean.
Design a water-themed Pokemon that showcases a beautiful gradient of blue shades and has a sleek body.
Show me an adorable fish Pokemon with vivid blue colors and intricate fins, perfect for ocean habitats.
